org.apache.lucene.index
Interface TermPositionVector

All Superinterfaces:
TermFreqVector
public interface TermPositionVector
extends TermFreqVector

Extends TermFreqVector to provide additional information about positions in which each of the terms is found.

Method Summary
 int[] getTermPositions(int index)
          Returns an array of positions in which the term is found.
 
Methods inherited from interface org.apache.lucene.index.TermFreqVector
getField, getTermFrequencies, getTerms, indexesOf, indexOf, size
 

Method Detail

getTermPositions

public int[] getTermPositions(int index)
Returns an array of positions in which the term is found. Terms are identified by the index at which its number appears in the term number array obtained from getTermNumbers method.
